Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: What a fun pub!!! Friendly and funny employees,  super cool vibe, all the beers and liquors one person could need. Shuffle board and billiards! The chicken tenders and onion rings are delish!

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: I have been going to Toons for a very long time. This is some of the best bar food in the city. The smoked meats, the burgers, the wings are all great. They have daily food specials. There is a definitely a Cajun/New Orleans/Louisiana ‚Ä¶

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Super friendly staff with good alternative music in the background but not so loud that you cannot converse with those around you. The front is a bar and the back room has the standard bar games including darts and shuffleboard.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: I went to Toons today. After many months I have finally tried it. One of the best bartenders I have ever had came around: he was knowledgeable, funny, and personable. His name was Ben, and he took no sh*t. He was pressed by a very invalid ‚Ä¶

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Difficult to park. Washroom area needs some loving. Dirt, mold, smelly area near the washrooms and inside the washrooms. Service was nice. Ribs were yummy. Reasonable prices.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Stopped in night with the family for dinner after Zoo Lights. Great meal. The wings, burgers and pulled turkey were on point. The only downside is the music volume. Get it if it is crowded, but it was pretty empty, made it hard to have a ‚Ä¶

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Great neighborhood pub with a decent beer selection, regular drink specials and a really good food menu. Some standards but also some unique dishes. A fun place to hang with friends.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: A casual and delightful atmosphere with room for escalating parties. Shuffleboard table, billiards, and arcade games.  Friendly staff and  good atmosphere for most types of conversation and revelry. Prices are fair and selection is ‚Ä¶

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: üòä Tbh love the drinks, friendly/helpful staff, have even picked up their food carryout--just, must be some kind of curse, rendezvous at this convenient & tasty *nearby* neighborhood dive bar/grill  never gets me a second dateüòèüíî

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Watched a Chiefs game here. If you're a Chiefs fan, this is the place to be on game day. Service was great, food was good, solid beer selection and the atmosphere during a game is awesome.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Matt recommended the Ranch Water seltzer. So impressed and will always trust his opinion now. Best seltzer ever and don't know anywhere else that serves it.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: I kind of want to keep this local to myself. But, it is a great example of a Chicago neighborhood bar. Get wings.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Staff are very friendly and accomodating! Beer prices are reasonable, although selection is average, but bar food portion sizes are quite good! The bar seats are not the most comfortable for everyone. Accessibility from the south side ‚Ä¶

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Awesome Kansas City Chiefs bar in the heart of Chicago. Get there early if you are from out of town to watch the chiefs game!

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: I've been going to Toons for years since I work nearby. Toons is a great local neighborhood bar and grill with really good food especially for a bar, it's semi-kid friendly meaning although it's a bar families frequently go here and kids ‚Ä¶

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Got the Wednesday burger special and will definitely be back for more. Had a fantastic beer menu as well! Tip: try the Chile habanero sauce if your a pepperhead.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text:
Top notch food
#hogsforthecause2021
#slowmotionformeat ‚Ä¶

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Hometown atmosphere.  Great staff. Very attentive.  Food is fantastic.  Good choice of beers and beverages.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Toons is a neighborhood Chicago bar with exceptional food and drink. Fine dining bar food at a reasonable price. And  a beer selection that will complement whatever you order to eat. My compliments to the owner and wait staff!

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Friendly and attentive staff, excellent food (personal fav is the Cubano, but never HD anything bad). Great local that also caters to Cubs pre/post-game, KC Chiefs, Blackhawks, and I'm sure others I don't know. Refer to first line. :)

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Great atmosphere, service is awesome. The bar tender Claire is awesome!

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Great place. Service is always friendly and knowledgeable. Nice menu on food and beer. I do my own bbq so...that means mine is better than everyone's..that said. They do a good job and I would and do order it. Currently looks like the back ‚Ä¶

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Saw this restaurant on the news a couple weeks ago and since that we've have been there 3 times!! Absolutely love it!! Amazing buffalo strips, Buffalo wings and the fresh cut fries are to die for!! The staff is great and super nice!! Also, ‚Ä¶

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Wow, great to see this is still a neighborhood tavern. My first time there was 1967 with my grandparents. All German back in the day. Don't quite remember the name back then, was definitely German though. Looks as though they are doing very well, glad to see it!

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Friendliest bar on the neighborhood!! Super chill place (unless the chiefs win the Super bowl then it turns up!). Wings are great! Can‚Äôt go wrong here!

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Friendly, attentive staff. Not over crowded on Cub game days. Very good food and fair beer prices. Easy 10 min walk to Wrigley.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Great draft beer selection and plenty of bar food to choose from!

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Always great. Nice happy crowd. Great food. Great staff.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Love this bar! The best bar food you will find in Chicago. Big fan of their homemade burgers, fries and soups! Buffalo chicken tenders are addicting and service is always on point. Thanks for doing it up right!

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: We go here all the time on Mondays for half price wings. It‚Äôs a great deal and all the apps are half off. They also do $3.50 pbr tall boys and it‚Äôs become our Monday tradition. Love the garlic buffalo sauce and their onion rings are ‚Ä¶

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Watched England lose here. Great atmosphere (despite the couple of Italian tables). The bar girl was a legend.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Food is good here but the atmosphere is blah. They also will not allow registered service dogs, despite paperwork provided. Not that friendly of a place, would not recommend.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: This is one of my favorite local spots in the city. Great for Cubs fans and KC fans. They have shuffle board, darts and pool. They have a great beer selection and the best in house pineapple shots around. You can't go wrong with this place any day of the week.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Crawfish Boils are the best. Must try the pineapple shots too

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Cozy neighborhood pub. Great wings, nice servers

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Just a great, chill place with no pretension and friendly hosts.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: The bar was loud inside (not a complaint, just the way it was) so we sat outside with our group to eat and have a few beers. ‚Ä¶

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Well, can‚Äôt speak for actually going in, but some guy was putting up chairs outside when we were riding by and asked us ‚Äúwhy are you staring at me?‚Äù  Kinda creep.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: I love Toons! This place has been a neighborhood staple since I moved to Chicago. The at home feel plus an amazing staff makes you not want to leave. I love coming here anytime of year. This is a great place to catch a Cubs game if you ‚Ä¶

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Toons is my first stop in Wrigleyville. You cannot find a better burger than the KC Special. Grab a shot of pineapple vodka!

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Toons "is what it is".  Kind if divey.  Fun with friends, but keep the order simple.  Not the place to go for a cocktail, stick w/  a name Brand or classic (i.e. Whiskey and Coke) and you'll be fine.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: The place has cool stuff but is definitely worn down. It's time to replace the floors at least. The typical bar food is cheap and packaged, which isn't bad, just not my thing for I like a little home cooking type of foods. The staff is nice ‚Ä¶

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: The food is outstanding. Much better than the average Tavern fare. The price point is extremely reasonable, daily specials for food and booze. All the employees are really nice except one waitress dark hair, sort of thick. The owner and the other patrons are fantastic.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: One of the best bars in Chicago! They have a great selection of drinks, the food is 2nd to none, friendly atmosphere and service is exceptional!!

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Best neighborhood bar in the city hands down. The staff is awesome, the food is great and is always a great spot to watch sports! If you are in the area and looking for a good low-key spot this is the place.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: It's a medium-sized bar with great staff and excellent customer service. They have dine in deals just like half priced appetizers on Mondays. Gets packed on weekends and game nights (football, baseball). I love it there. I had my first legal alcohol beverage there. It's home.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Great time here! The food was good and the service was great even when they were busy for the game.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Recommended by a friend. Was not disappointed. The sandwich and beer selection/recommendations were fantastic. I thoroughly enjoyed interacting with Ben the bartender. He gives good hugs.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: The service could be better but the drinks are reasonably priced.  They have specials every night of the week and free darts in the back.  They also play a ride variety of music at this bar.  Everything from 80's pop to modern alternative to hip hop.  I have not tried the food here but from what I've seen the dishes look pretty tasty.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: $5 Burger special today normally it is 9. The burger was very good. Their menu is not huge but it covers a number of dietary taste. They have salads they have sandwiches they have Burgers they have wraps and even some vegan options as well. ‚Ä¶

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Good food and very friendly service.  Rich and AG are great!!

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Toons is a great place to get a quick bite of American bar food. My boyfriend and I always go on Mondays for half off appetizers and the waitress that works that night provides great service. Definitely recommend the buffalo chicken strips!

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: I went to Toons for the first time last night and as a Chiefs fan I can tell you there is no better bar in the city to watch a KC game. Food is damn good and the bartenders are quick, friendly, and accommodating. Oh and they have Dovetail lager on tap! Thank you!

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Nice local spot food is great the staff is friendly and you have a good time with Chicago Cubs fans.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Great place. Wish they had a larger patio. Don't forget to try their food ... fantastic.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Fun neighborhood bar. Decent BBQ and good drink prices. Friendly staff and relatively chill patrons. There is a shuffleboard that takes four quarters and one pool table.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Toons is my favorite bar in all of Chicago. Exceptionally good energy, friendly staff, amazing food. My Happy place 10/10

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Great wings and fun trivia night!

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Authentic neighborhood bar that hasn't lost its soul to commercial Wrigleyville. I wasn't very hungry and had only a bowl of chili (good!) but everyone in our party was happy with their food and drinks. Prices were very fair considering the location.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Awesome chiefs bar.  Food was really good.  Service was A+

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Toons is a great little neighborhood bar. They have pool and shuffleboard in the back. The bartenders are all really awesome, and they treat their regulars really well. On a weekend or after a Cubs game, it might be full of rowdy people, but otherwise it's really relaxed.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: I didn't become a man until I experienced Toons. The music, beer, and wait staff really makes you feel like you're at home in your living room. I never thought that beer and a bar would make me feel cozy like Toons. I want to personally thank everyone there for my man hood and the geniune service.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Maybe I'm being a little biased because I am a native Kansas citian and Chiefs fan but what an awesome cozy little bar. Tommy was an excellent bartender and I was greeted with a handshake before I even sat down at the bar...wish we had this bar in Kansas City

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Good daily specials, good prices, and the black and blue burger is delightful. Get there quickly on NCAA football days if you want to sit outside as patio space is limited, but it's pretty available the rest of the year!

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Was there on 9/5/21. Worst service ever. Had to wait 15 minutes just to pay after awful service. One bartender was super wasted. Only bad service here twice and tonight may have ended my patronage here

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Love Toon"s!!! Atmosphere is warm and friendly. Rich is the best. By far the best food I have had in a long time. It's always consistent. I've had ribs,wings,burger, the catfish po' boy and the beer batter onion rings. Everything is soooo good! Best on the northside for sure!!

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Loved the signature drinks, but we were surprised to see the drinks were full priced even though they were advertised as half off on Mondays.  Karaoke was a great time, but the waitstaff could have been friendlier.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: I really like the wings at this location. The Buffalo and Korean are the best. Drinks are tasty and reasonably priced. The atmosphere is friendly I don't frequent bars often but the food and drinks and atmosphere is really nice.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: My home away from home. Great food, friendly staff, cool atmosphere!

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Cool spot that's open late. Great beers and drinks that are priced well. Away from the craziness of Clark St in Wrigleyville which makes this spot ideal to just hang out and be able to make conversation with friends without loud blaring music.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Toons is one of my favorite spots. As a fan of 'dive' bars, this place lives up to it. Great, and cheap night of fun. Bar has a pool table, shuffle board, and great drinks. Will always hit this place up when I'm in Chicago.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: We came here few times and it was fine.  We stopped in for a drink after the Cubs parade and took 15 minutes to get the attention of the bartender.. yes, I know they were super busy so we totally understand that.. BUT then the waiters and ‚Ä¶

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: All the makings of a solid/great neighborhood bar. Pool table, table shuffleboard, varied beer selection, and cheap food specials. The servers have a lot of personality and do a great job

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Great divey bar in a great Hood.   Their BBQ is top notch, as is all of their food - gotta have the wings! Pretty solid beer selection,  but not if you're a hipster beer cicerone wanna be (if you know what a cicerone is, you might be ‚Ä¶

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Best Chiefs Bar in the city! Its like home.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: This place was the perfect spot to grab something to eat before heading to the Music Box. The bar tender was polite and attentive. I had their portobello sandwich and it was wonderful! Well priced too!

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: One of our favorite bars in the neighborhood! Great food and drink specials and nice people working there. Can't recommend enough.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Good beer selection with decent prices. Enough TVs. Food was hit or miss, some great, some not. Chicken tenders only had 3 small tenders.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Our local and cozy bar. great beer selection and the food is always there is solid. we meet their for guys night out and we always have fun.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: I have never hated a bar more than I hated Toons. They only get the second star because, as I recall, they had a shuffleboard table in the back and this reviewer happens to love tabletop shuffleboard. Anyway, back to the hatred: I have ‚Ä¶

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Nice local sports bar ambiance in the City.  The bathroom was much nicer than I expected, somewhere around a 6 on a ten point scale. Friendly staff. Fair pricing.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Just the best friendly neighborhood spot. Great daily specials and AJ is the best bartender.  Love to come here for a game of pool, wings, po boys and good beer selection.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Great place to go to watch some football.  This is a Chiefs bar and I feel at home on Sundays here.  I can even forgive the fact that it is also a Jayhawks Bar.  (M-I-Z-Z-O-U!!)  On Sunday that doesn't matter. ‚Ä¶

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Nice but small outside seating. Standard fare menu and drink selections. Attentive service. Half price burger on Wednesdays and other specials the rest of the week.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: I had a major craving for a burger the week i ordered takeout from here. It was my first time ever being here despite it being no more than an 8 min walk home....the burger i had imagined in my head was juicy with lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, ‚Ä¶

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Hands down one of my favorite places in the city. Friendly staff, good food, excellent drink selection, and pool, shuffleboard, and darts in the backroom. The perfect place to relax with some friends.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text:
Great prices, has a great combo of food, games and drinks
Pool table (Can't recall if $1 or $1.50), darts (free) and another game I'm unsure of as I don't play it. Also has a safari hunting arcade game.
Note that the kitchen closes at 11pm

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: The menu and service were beyond our expectations. I really liked the environment of this spot. Awesome place to take my family out for dinner.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Not a bad Kansas CIty bar on Southport in the Lakeview area. Decent beer selection. The onion ring platter is enough to serve 4 people. Check it out!

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Amazing Chiefs bar!

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: I live right around the corner and Toons is the perfect local bar to grab a beer with friends. Good prices, good selection, and a friendly staff -- plus pool, darts and shuffleboard.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Great neighborhood bar. The kind of place where they know your order as you walk in the door!

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Food was cold. Took 15 minutes to get a soda... and we were sitting next to the bar. Obnoxious jerks everywhere, laughing and jeering at people coming in with Santa hats on... three days before Christmas!! If you are a douche, jerk or one ‚Ä¶

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: This is just a fantastic neighborhood dive bar. Great deals every day. Friendly and helpful staff. Pool, darts, shuffleboard, and virtual golf. Great spot.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Best bar in Chicago, amazing wings and catfish po boy sandwich!

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Our server wasn't super friendly, but it was late night and 90 degrees out. Very cute bar. Decent prices.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Great and friendly service. Good food and beer.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Great food , amazing staff lots of fun atmosphere with a little new Orleans flair amazing wings and incredible crawfish boils

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Great food #porkmafia inda house

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Great food, drinks, and most importantly - wonderful staff.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Wings are legit, staff is very helpful and intelligent.  Outdoor patio is cozy. Prices are right.  What else can you ask for?

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Best "traditional style" wings in the city.  Buff Joes is the best in the Chicagoland area but toons takes the cake for downtown.  Birds Nest is good too but Toons has the most authentic buffalo flavor.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Best place to watch a Chiefs game east of the Mississippi!! Awesome food, good service, beer prices are great! Cannot complain one bit

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: One of the best bar food places in Lakeview.  Great bartenders.  Fun place for lunch too.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Love this little place tucked away in Wrigleyville. Fairly standard bar food, but it's always fresh, and when they do their meat smoking or crawfish boil out back, don't miss it.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Staff is awesome. Drinks are good and the food is great.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Thursday's special is $4 for a 6-piece of wings (regularly $7) we ordered and the wings came out in 5 minutes fresh, hot and juicy!!

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Not a real Chiefs bar if you're wondering. Won't even invest in an NFL package to get preseason games and won't try to get the games. This place is a fraud.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Great neighborhood bar. Always have good drink specials and the food is great.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Really fun bar, always packed on the weekends, but I always end up having a good time here. Pretty good prices as well!

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Haven't been there in several years but, they do have the best turkey burger there is. The prices are very reasonable for Chicago.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Great spot for drinks in Wrigleyville!

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Divey atmosphere with really good food. The cuban is probably one of the best Ive had. The bartenders are great.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Good bar food. My thanks to the waitstaff.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Great service, atmosphere, food & drinks, plenty of TV'S, games and just an all around good crowd, place!!!

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: A fun local spot. It's not really close to the action was far as the bars adjacent to Wrigley Field are concerned, but if you follow some of the locals, you'll find it.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Great bar to stop by at before a show at The Music Box or a game at Wrigley. Definitely get the Buffalo wings.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: One of my favorites in Lakeview. Shuffleboard, pool, and always a really fun atmosphere. I've never had a bad time here.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Good drinks n the wings are flame an burgers too

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Great neighborhood bar with good food.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Great to find a Chiefs bar while going to see the Cubs.  Great food and drink specials on Wednesdays.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Great sports bar, good beer list with specials and reasonably priced good food.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Great, service, atmosphere and the food is awesome!!! I had the pulled pork sandwich and it was one of the best I have ever had!

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Ben the server was the BEST. totally made our experience fun. Eat the wings.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Great local bar. Half dive, half Cheers. KC Chiefs bar, and almost always has hockey on, if they can.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Local, plenty of beer, good food, and sports of course. Only a 4 just because there were some blind spots in terms of TV.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Met is an excellent bartender. Friday night specials on point. Great place to take a date.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Always a good time at Toons!

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Best neighborhood bar in the city. Good beer selection and great bar food.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: One of the best neighborhood bars in Lakeview. Great draft list and THE BEST wings in Chicago bar none

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: I am from Kansas....great to find a Chiefs sports bar. The general manager was very welcoming!

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: One of the best wings and Fries I've tried! Great Job Chef!

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: toons bar is a really nice place to hang out with friends and get some beers. They also have pool tables.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: SUCH a great day. Lunch. Drinks. Shots. MATT. Nuff Said!! Stop In Soon!!

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: This is a great place. A big selection of beers and very tasty and good food.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Awesome. Tasty burger, great prices, cool atmosphere. If I lived in the neighborhood I'd be here every day.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: If you go on a monday, ask for ol'Ben. Tell him your droid had a massage for him and then slowly caress his shoulders and back and whisper beep boo bee boo in his ear.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: WENT TO THE CRAWFISH BROIL HERE AND WAS NOT DISAPPOINTED THE BEST AND MOST AMOUN OF CRAWFISH THAT I HAVE EVER EATEN!!!!! I WILL GO AGAIN AND HOPE THAT THERE ARE MORE SEAFOOD EVENTS AT THIS GREAT BAR!

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Went there for Thursday special six jumbo wings but they were too hard Fry's was very hard

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Great bar, great staff and, most importantly, best wings in the city.  Toons rules.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Good ol' dive bar...bartender was cool and chatting with us for a bit.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Great atmosphere to grab a drink and hang out with friends. Plenty of room for activities

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Nice place good happy hour food at  half off nice beer selection on tap

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: This place is so great! The PoBoys are fantastic! Great daily specials and special events too. So much love for Toons!

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: One of my favorite bars there in Chicago. Close to Wrigley without the hustle and bustle.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: I can't believe it took me this long to find this place, but I'm so glad I did! This is the only place I'll go on Chiefs game days.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Love it, friendly bartenders great wings  and great prices.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Hard to find and not desirable.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Good place to enjoy bar food and catch a ball game, but could use more seating.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Love this place. Neighborhood feel to it that is now starting to lack on the Southport Corridor. Plus they have shuffle board!

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: After a long search for the best Buffalo wings in Chicago, I have finally found my go to wing spot.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Great bar staples and BBQ. Great drinks in a low key atmosphere.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: If you like amazing food and atmosphere, Toons is as good as it gets in or out of Chicago.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Some of the best food in the neighborhood.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: great atmosphere. staff are lovely. the food is delicious! great location

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Great service. Cold beer. Awesome food.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Great neighborhood bar. Friendly bartenders, trivia nights, jukebox, and a solid menu.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Gum ball head. Best music plays here. Wings.. ribs... wings... toons burger!

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Best wings in the country. Great staff. This place is Heaven on Earth!

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Surprisingly good food. The onion rings were some of the best I've had

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Great little local joint! Shuffle board in back, decent prices, good all around!

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Love this place! Great food, great staff, and a casual hangout.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Neighborhood staple. Good draft selection, good prices. They serve food and have drink specials.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Great little neighborhood bar. 10/10 will drink there again.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Fun place to grab a drink. More neighborhood bar than crazy hangout.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Excellent little neighborhood joint with drink specials and great nibbles.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Best chili!! Food better than your average bar and grill.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Good drink selection and shuffleboard

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Very nice place, the beer selection is good.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Great bar food, shuffleboard and beer list!!

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Great food and bar joint...

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Great local hangour bar with good food and service

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Favorite neighborhood bar great food and service.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Good craft beer selection with typical bar food.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Great burgers and fries. Kansas City Chiefs fan hangout.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Great food, great service, great tap list, and great environment

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Really nice bar to visit. Low key and chill.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: One of the few remaining authentically Wrigley places near Wrigley. The wings complete me.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Good food and good beer, a local bar for sports enthusiasts.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Amazing place! it's very down to earth would recommend it for all.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Cool place. Good selection of beer.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Large tap selection. Open layout.  Friendly staff.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Kinda Quiet Atmosphere..Good Food& Drinks

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Never been there, but I accidentally rated the place and it looks decent so I gave it 4 stars. Cheers!

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Neat little neighborhood bar with a great beer selection!

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Good food, however, the service is a little slow.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Great bar to watch Chiefs/high-five strangers.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Always a great time @ TOON'S!..GREAT STAFF..GOOD PEOPLE!üëç

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Friendly neighborhood bar with great food.

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Great deals on wings Thursdays! Get um crispy!

Name: Tunes Bar
Review Text: Delicious food and  friendly  bartenders!
